abstract: The Avis Budget Group moved closer to making a formal bid, but the move was somewhat unusual in that Avis has not yet made a formal offer.
snippet: The Avis Budget Group moved closer to making a formal bid, but the move was somewhat unusual in that Avis has not yet made a formal offer.
lead_paragraph: The Avis Budget Group moved closer on Thursday to making a bid for the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group, saying it was seeking federal antitrust approval of its potential acquisition. The move is somewhat unusual in that Avis has not yet made a formal offer, while Dollar Thrifty has already agreed to be acquired by Hertz Global Holdings for $1.2 billion in cash and stock.

headline.main: Avis Seeks Antitrust Approval of Likely Dollar Bid
